title: Same Flower - what best characterizes the shift

content.prompt: Which best characterizes the shift that occurs in lines 41-43?

choices.label: The speaker wearies of the natural world.
The speaker returns to the reality of the moment.
The daisy loses its appeal for the speaker.
The daisy transforms into a fantastical object.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
